topic.title: Interconnect Yeastar S-Series VoIP PBX and TA FXS Gateway
topic.shortdesc: Interconnect S-Series VoIP PBX and Yeastar TA FXS gateway to extend analog phones.

body.p: In the topic, we tested with Yeastar S-Series VoIP PBX version 30.7.0.35 and Yeastar TA3200 version 40.19.0.30.
After connecting the Yeastar S-Series VoIP PBX and the Yeastar TA FXS gateway, you can achieve the followings:

ul.li: Make calls between the analog phones and the SIP extensions of the PBX
Receive inbound calls on the analog phones
Use the PBX's trunk to make outbound calls from the analog phones

body.section:
1. Create an extension on the PBXLog in the PBX web interface, go to Settings PBX Extensions , create one extension.
You will use this extension to register on the FXS port of TA3200 later.

section.title: 2. Configure a VoIP Server on TA3200
section.p: Log in the TA3200 web interface, go to Gateway VoIP Settings VoIP Server Settings , set a VoIP Server.

ul.li: Server Name: Set a name to help you identify the VoIP server.
Hostname/IP: Enter the IP address of your PBX and the SIP registration port.
Domain: Enter the IP address of your PBX.

section.title: 3. Set a Dial Pattern Template on TA3200
section.p: Go to Gateway VoIP Settings Dial Pattern Template , edit one template according to your needs.
The default dial pattern allows you to call any number.

section.title: 4. Edit FXS port of TA3200
section.p: Go to Gateway Port List Port List , register one FXS port as the SIP extension of the PBX.

ul.li: Caller ID Name: Set a name to help you identify the FXS port.
Caller ID Number: Enter the SIP extension number.
VoIP Server: Choose the VoIP server that is for the PBX.
User Name: Enter the SIP extension number.
Authentication Name: Enter the registration name of the SIP extension.
Password: Enter the registration password of the SIP extension.
Dial Pattern Template: Choose the dial pattern template that will be applied to the FXS port.
DID Number: Enter the SIP extension number.

section.title: 5. Check the status of the FXS port
section.p: Go to Status System Status FXS Port Status to check the status of the FXS port.
If the Status shows "OK", the FXS port is registered as the SIP extension of the PBX.
You can make internal calls between the analog phones and the extensions of the PBX now.

section.title: 6. Set outbound call permission for the FXS port
section.p: To make outbound calls from the analog phone, you need to set call permission for the SIP extension that is registered on the FXS port of TA3200.

p.note: To make outbound calls from the analog phone of TA3200, you need to follow by the dial pattern rule of TA3200 and dial pattern rule of the PBX.

ol.li: Log in the PBX web interface, go to Settings PBX Call Control Outbound Route , edit your outbound route or add a new outbound route for the FXS port.
Select the SIP extension that is registered on the FXS port to the Selected box.

section.title: 7. Set inbound call permission for the FXS port
section.p: To receive inbound calls on the analog phone of TA3200, you need to check if the SIP extension that is registered to the FXS port is reachable through an inbound route.
You can set the destination to the SIP extension, IVR, ring group, or queue that contains the SIP extension.
